description: The 27 Legendary Nikes - special fragments of OG Nike carrying more of his essence. More power, more burden, more vulnerable to corruption.
expansionNote: The Shattering created 5,555 fragments. We know of 27 Legendaries. More may exist undiscovered in dimensions we haven't reached.

categories.champions: Combat specialists. Warriors who fight on the front lines.
categories.scholars: Knowledge keepers. The ones who solve problems.
categories.beasts: More creature than pig. Primal power.
categories.cosmic: Connected to the fabric of existence itself.

legendaryNikes.name: Gladiator Nike
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Contract - fighting is all he knows
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Corruption Wars (500-1000 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: AT LAST. WORTHY OPPONENTS.

legendaryNikes.name: Ninja Nike
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Contract - saw futures without hope
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Forgetting (300-500 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: I thought I saw Shiro leave through a portal. I convinced myself I was dreaming.

legendaryNikes.name: Viking Nike
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Addiction - needed battle to feel alive
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Forgetting (300-500 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: I've killed everything worth killing. What's left?

legendaryNikes.name: Nike Tyson Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Float like a butterfly, sting like a Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Champion - 'Boxer Nike' in Comic Book 1. Striker/Morale.
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Boredom - no worthy opponents left
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Corruption Wars (500-1000 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: EVERYONE'S GOT A PLAN TILL THEY GET PUNCHED IN THE FACE.
legendaryNikes.note: Name evolved from 'Boxer Nike' to 'Nike Tyson' over millennia as legend became myth.

legendaryNikes.name: Cyberpunk Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Neon-lit street warrior of the future
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Ideology - believed Nolem's way was better
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Corruption Wars (500-1000 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: The system is broken. I'm just accelerating the inevitable.

legendaryNikes.name: Berjador Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Godzilla-like kaiju charged with infinite power
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Held a dimensional breach for seven days while others escaped
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Couldn't leave his post - the breach would have consumed everything
legendaryNikes.corruptionTheme: The warrior who can't stop fighting
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Exhaustion - forgot what he was fighting FOR
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The First Falls (50-100 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: I... CAN'T... STOP...

legendaryNikes.name: Bertus Maximus Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Fighting his own war in another dimension
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Unreachable - deep in enemy territory
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Fulfillment - found endless war with Nolem
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The First Falls (50-100 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: IS THAT ALL YOU'VE GOT?!

legendaryNikes.name: Dr Caleb Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Critical research - sent data instead of coming in person
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Research too important to pause
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Curiosity - wanted to understand Nolem from inside
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Scholar Legacy (100-300 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: To truly understand something, you must become it.

legendaryNikes.name: Professor Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Focused on preservation, not combat
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Unknown

legendaryNikes.name: Satoshi Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Systems were too important to abandon
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Regret - his systems weren't enough to save anyone
legendaryNikes.quote: I built something meant to last forever. Nothing lasts forever.

legendaryNikes.name: Corey Hort Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Too deep in research to be reached
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Unknown

legendaryNikes.name: Guthix Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: His music was holding dimensions stable
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Unknown

legendaryNikes.name: Nel Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Too unstable - might have turned mid-battle
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Self-hatred - believed she deserved corruption
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: The Forgetting (300-500 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: I was always going to end up here. At least now I've stopped pretending.

legendaryNikes.name: Pigsterio Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: His magic might have destroyed allies too
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Guilt - used his power once and destroyed something precious
legendaryNikes.quote: I told them my power was too dangerous. They should have listened.

legendaryNikes.name: Jedi Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Master of the Force across dimensions
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Guarding a different sector of the multiverse
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: His sector needed him more
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Unknown

legendaryNikes.name: Hydra Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Multiple minds couldn't agree to join
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Internal conflict - heads argued endlessly
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Internal conflict - Nolem offered peace between the heads
legendaryNikes.quote: For the first time, we agree on something. Silence.

legendaryNikes.name: Wolf Mode Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Lost to his curse - too dangerous to approach
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Couldn't tell friend from foe
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Curse - the wolf was always there, Nolem just let it out
legendaryNikes.quote: The wolf doesn't serve Nolem. The wolf serves no one. That's the point.

legendaryNikes.name: Colossal Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Collateral damage too high to deploy
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Would have destroyed the Colosseum just by arriving
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Guilt - accidentally destroyed a dimension trying to save it
legendaryNikes.quote: I tried to help. I always try to help. Everything I touch breaks.

legendaryNikes.name: Elbonzys Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Charizard-like dragon master, born from flame
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Refused to leave his domain
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Unknown

legendaryNikes.name: Cardano Whale Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Majestic whale blessed by crypto currents
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Deep in dimensional currents - couldn't be reached
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: No way to communicate with him
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Grief - lost something in the depths
legendaryNikes.quote: The currents showed me what I lost. Nolem showed me how to forget.

legendaryNikes.name: Cosmic Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Born from stardust and reality itself
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Drifting between realities - couldn't be located
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Exists partially outside normal space
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Nihilism - saw the heat death of the universe and gave up
legendaryNikes.quote: Everything ends. Everything. Why delay the inevitable?

legendaryNikes.name: Phoenix Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Was literally dead at the time (temporarily)
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Exhaustion - tired of endless rebirth
legendaryNikes.corruptionEra: Early Silence (100-200 years after Prime Era)
legendaryNikes.quote: Do you know what it's like to die a thousand times? To wake up AGAIN? I just want to sleep.

legendaryNikes.name: McJared Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Probability said he wouldn't help (he calculated wrong)
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Calculation - the math said Nolem would win, so he joined the winning side
legendaryNikes.quote: The odds were 99.7% that Nolem wins. I'm just being rational.

legendaryNikes.name: Olecram Nike
legendaryNikes.description: Chimera with dragon arm and jelly head
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Identity crisis - didn't know which side he was on
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Couldn't be trusted - too unstable
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Identity loss - Nolem promised to make him whole
legendaryNikes.quote: I don't know what I am. At least with Nolem, I don't have to.

legendaryNikes.name: Melon Nike
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Unknown
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Willing betrayal - chose to join Nolem

legendaryNikes.name: Peter Porker Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: Protecting his home dimension - refused to leave
legendaryNikes.whyNotRecruited: Said his dimension needed him more
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Exhaustion - carried too much alone for too long
legendaryNikes.quote: With great power comes... exhaustion. So much exhaustion.

legendaryNikes.name: OG Nike
legendaryNikes.description: The original, the legend, the first Nike
legendaryNikes.primeEraRole: THE TEMPLATE - source of all 5,555 Nikes
legendaryNikes.burden: Feels every Nike across every dimensionâ€”their joys, fears, and deaths
legendaryNikes.corruptionReason: Exhaustion - carrying 5,555 souls for eons
legendaryNikes.quote: Nike Prime isn't one soul carrying 5,555. Nike Prime is 5,555 souls carrying each other.
legendaryNikes.specialNote: Final raid boss - represents what happens if the Template falls

primeEraChampions.description: The Five Champions gathered by Stoner Nike for Comic Book 1
primeEraChampions.note: Nike Tyson was called 'Boxer Nike' during the Prime Era. The name evolved over millennia.

scholarNikes.description: The minds who built Nike Prime (not Legendary Nikes but important)
scholarNikes.note: These are not Legendary Nikes but played crucial roles in Comic Book 1
